format: This data frame contains the following columns:
description:
Description
This is a subset of the allbacks data frame 
which gives measurements
on the volume and weight of 8 paperback books.
title: Measurements on a Selection of Paperback Books
reference: The bookshelf of J. H. Maindonald.

parameters.weight: a numeric vector giving the weights in grams
parameters.volume:
a numeric vector giving the book volumes
in cubic centimeters
